Package org.jsapar.compose

Classes for converting an Document or a Line into an output.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Composer
    Common interface for composer classes.
    ComposerFactory
    Interface for factory class that creates schema composer based on schema.
    LineComposer
    Composes output of a line
    SchemaComposer
    Internal common interface for all schema composers that uses a schema to compose text output.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractSchemaComposer
    Abstract base class for schema composers with standard behavior.
    CellComposer
    Internal utility class that helps composing a cell.
    TextComposerFactory
    Factory for creating schema composer based on schema.
    ValidationHandler
    Internal utility class for handling validation error.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ComposeException
    Error that can happen when composing.

Package org.jsapar.compose Description

Classes for converting an Document or a Line into an output.

The output type is defined by the different implementations of the Composer interface

See sample files in the samples folder of the project. The JUnit test org.jsapar.JSaParExamplesTest.java contains a more comprehensive set of examples of how to use the package.
